participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and artistic, Lena wears her heart on her sleeve and is dedicated to her passion for ballet.
participant_1.background: My pointe shoes are my most prized possessions because they represent my years of dedication to ballet. I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites. I'm afraid that I'll never be as good of a cook as my father was. My girlfriend tells me she’s going to leave me almost every day. I live in Vienna, Austria now.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Max is introspective and dedicated, balancing his love for teaching with a creative streak.
participant_2.background: I don't talk about my parents. Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling. I'm a hard worker with a sweet tooth. I don't play for anyone, but I love huge paintings and my favorite food is salad. I work for a clothes retailer.

content.text: Hi there!  What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
Hi there! I love to travel and teach.  How about you?
I have been to Vienna, Austria!  I love it there.  I am a ballet dancer and I love reading about pet training.
That is so cool!  I have never been to Austria.  I am not very athletic, but I love huge paintings!
I am not an athlete either, but I love to dance.  I am clumsy, but I love it.  I am afraid my girlfriend is going to leave me almost every day.
Why do you think she is going to leave you?
I am not sure.  She just always says she is going to leave me.  I do not know what I do wrong.
I am sure you are a great person and she does not mean it.  Maybe she is just frustrated with something.
Maybe.  I hope so.  I love her a lot.
I am sure she loves you too.
I hope so.  I am going to go practice now.  It was nice talking to you!
